attributes.action: To rebuild all Police station car parks (which are within the vicinity of train stations) as multi-storey car parks in order to provide free parking for the police as well as commuters or residents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the rise of controlled parking zones & the planned increased congestion, for congestion charge justification, commuting is becoming increasingly impractical & residential streets are over crowded. This simple measure would allow the government to be seen to be addressing the two problems of parking for both residents and commuters both in cars and on two wheels (motorbikes & bicycles)
